meanings.definition: A breed of dog known for herding sheep.
meanings.sent1: The sheepdogs guided the sheep to the pasture.
meanings.sent2: The farmer relied on the sheepdogs to keep the flock safe.
meanings.sent3: The sheepdogs were like furry shepherds for the sheep.
meanings.sent4: The sheepdogs were the unsung heroes of the farm.
meanings.sent5: The sheepdogs' herding skills were unmatched.

meanings.definition: Dogs trained to protect and guard sheep.
meanings.sent1: The sheepdogs stood watch over the flock all night.
meanings.sent2: The sheepdogs barked loudly to scare away predators.
meanings.sent3: The sheepdogs took their job of protecting the sheep very seriously.
meanings.sent4: The sheepdogs were the loyal guardians of the farm.
meanings.sent5: The sheepdogs' dedication to their duty was admirable.

meanings.definition: Dogs that are used to help herd sheep.
meanings.sent1: The sheepdogs rounded up the scattered sheep effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The sheepdogs worked together to bring the sheep back to the pen.
meanings.sent3: The sheepdogs made herding look like a fun game for the sheep.
meanings.sent4: The sheepdogs were like conductors orchestrating the sheep's movements.
meanings.sent5: The sheepdogs' teamwork in herding was impressive.
